lines.text: Raindrops falling, like a loud drumbeat
Puddles splash beneath our dancing feet
Streetlights shimmer on the silver ground
Our shoes are soaked, but our joy’s unbound
We’re dancing in the rain tonight
No umbrella, just the pale moonlight
Twisting, turning under skies so gray
This storm can’t wash our joy away
Thunder claps like it’s keeping time
Lightning strikes feel so divine
The rhythm’s wild, it won’t let go
But the beat still pulses in my soul
We’re dancing in the rain tonight
No umbrella, just the pale moonlight
Twisting, turning under skies so gray
This storm can’t wash our joy away
The world’s a blur, but we don’t care
Wind in our faces, freedom in the air
Laughter echoes in the pouring streams
We live the moment, chasing dreams
We’re dancing in the rain tonight
No umbrella, just the pale moonlight
Twisting, turning under skies so gray
This storm can’t wash our joy away
